<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Bugbear Thug](/Monsters.aspx?ID=58)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

The more common bugbear thug specializes in the art of lurking in the shadows.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 16

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 14

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 11
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Bugbear_BugbearThug.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 2">[Bugbear Thug](/Monsters.aspx?ID=58)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="NE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Goblin" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=81" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 47</row>

**Perception** +7; darkvision, scent (imprecise) 30 feet

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Goblin](/Languages.aspx?ID=6)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +6, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +7, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +4, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +6

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +4

**Dex** +2

**Con** +3

**Int** -1

**Wis** +1

**Cha** +0
</row>

**Items**
[Leather Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=4), [Javelin](/Weapons.aspx?ID=71) (3)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 17 

**Fort** +9 

**Ref** +8 

**Will** +5 

</row>

**HP** 34

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
bastard sword +10 ([two-hand d12](/Traits.aspx?ID=198)),
**Damage** 1d8+4 piercing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fist +10 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188)),
**Damage** 1d4+4 bludgeoning

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
javelin +8 ([thrown 30 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195)),
**Damage** 1d6+4 piercing

**Bushwhack** <actions string="Single Action" />  The bugbear thug [_Strides_](/Rules.aspx?ID=88) up to 10 feet and attempts to [_Grapple_](/Actions.aspx?ID=35) a creature they’re [_undetected_](/Conditions.aspx?ID=39) by. If they succeed, they also deal fist damage to that creature.

**Mauler**   The bugbear thug gains a +3 circumstance bonus to damage rolls against creatures they have [_grabbed_](/Conditions.aspx?ID=20).

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-17" />
